Package camppackage

Class CampUtility

java.lang.Object
camppackage.CampUtility
public class CampUtility extends Object
Class responsible for computation of camp numerical attributes within camppackage

  • Method Details

    • CampPos

      protected static int CampPos(Camp camp, ArrayList<Camp> listOfCamps)
      Method that searches for index position of a camp in list of camps
      Parameters:
      camp - Camp that is being searched for
      listOfCamps - Database of Camps
      Returns:
      Index position of camp if it exist in list, otherwise, return -1

    • isFull

      protected static boolean isFull(Camp camp, int attendeeSlotsUsed, int committeeSlots)
      Method that checks if attendee slots is full
      Parameters:
      camp - Camp that is being checked
      attendeeSlotsUsed - Attendee slots used for camp
      committeeSlots - Committee slots of a camp
      Returns:
      Boolean value indicating if a camp is full or not

    • userPos

      protected static int userPos(user.Student student, ArrayList<user.Student> list)
      For CommitteeList use: To find index of committee member in the list, and For AttendeeList use: To find index of attendee in the list, and For blackList use: To verify existence of student in blacklist
      Parameters:
      student - Student to find in a list
      list - Blacklist/Attendee list/Camp committee list
      Returns:
      Index position of student in list if they are in the list, otherwise, return -1

    • userPos

      protected static int userPos(String userID, ArrayList<user.Student> list)
      Overloaded method that passes userID instead of user object
      Parameters:
      userID - User identification of student to search for in list
      list - Blacklist/Attendee list/Camp committee list
